description: VirtualScroller is a performant approach to handle huge data efficiently.

methods.description: Defines methods that can be accessed by the component's reference.

values.name: getElementRef
values.description: Returns the reference of virtualScroller's container.

values.name: getRenderedRange
values.description: Returns the range of items added to the DOM.

values.name: scrollInView

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index of item according to orientation mode.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Defines the location of the item in view, valid values are 'to-start' and 'to-end'.

parameters.name: behavior
parameters.description: Behavior of scroll, valid values are 'auto' and 'smooth'

values.description: It is used to move the specified index into the view. It is a method that will usually be needed when keyboard support is added to the virtualScroller component.

values.name: scrollTo
values.description: Scroll to move to a specific position.

values.name: scrollToIndex

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index of item according to orientation mode.

parameters.name: behavior
parameters.description: Behavior of scroll, valid values are 'auto' and 'smooth'

values.description: Scroll to move to a specific item.

methods.label: Methods

props.description: Defines valid properties in VirtualScroller component.

values.name: appendOnly
values.description: Used to append each loaded item to top without removing any items from the DOM. Using very large data may cause the browser to crash.

values.name: autoSize
values.description: Whether to dynamically change the height or width of scrollable container.

values.name: class
values.description: CSS classes to add to root element.

values.name: className
values.description: Style class of the component.

values.name: columns
values.description: Columns of the virtual scroller for vertical option.

values.name: contentTemplate
values.description: The template of item's wrapper element.

values.name: delay
values.description: Delay in scroll before new data is loaded.

values.name: disabled
values.description: If disabled, the VirtualScroller feature is eliminated and the content is displayed directly.

values.name: id
values.description: Unique identifier of the element.

values.name: inline
values.description: When enabled, positions the content as inline.

values.name: items
values.description: An array of objects to display.

values.name: itemSize
values.description: The height/width of item according to orientation.

values.name: itemTemplate
values.description: The template of item.

values.name: lazy
values.description: Defines if data is loaded and interacted with in lazy manner.

values.name: loaderDisabled
values.description: Used to implement a custom loader instead of using the loader feature in the VirtualScroller.

values.name: loaderIconTemplate
values.description: The template of loader's icon.

values.name: loading
values.description: Whether the data is loaded.

values.name: loadingIcon
values.description: The icon to show while indicating data load is in progress.

values.name: loadingTemplate
values.description: The template of loader.

values.name: numToleratedItems
values.description: Determines how many additional elements to add to the DOM outside of the view. According to the scrolls made up and down, extra items are added in a certain algorithm in the form of multiples of this number. Default value is half the number of items shown in the view.

values.name: orientation
values.description: The orientation of scrollbar, valid values are 'vertical', 'horizontal' and 'both'.

values.name: pt
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

values.name: ptOptions
values.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

values.name: resizeDelay
values.description: Delay after window's resize finishes.

values.name: scrollHeight
values.description: Height of the scroll viewport.

values.name: scrollWidth
values.description: Width of the scroll viewport.

values.name: showLoader
values.description: Whether to show loader.

values.name: showSpacer
values.description: Used to implement a custom spacer instead of using the spacer feature in the VirtualScroller.

values.name: step
values.description: Used to specify how many items to load in each load method in lazy mode.

values.name: style
values.description: Inline style of the component.

values.name: tabIndex
values.description: Index of the element in tabbing order.

props.label: VirtualScrollerProps

callbacks.description: Defines callbacks that determine the behavior of the component based on a given condition or report the actions that the component takes.

values.name: onLazyLoad
values.description: Callback to invoke in lazy mode to load new data.

values.name: onScroll
values.description: Callback to invoke when scroll position changes.

values.name: onScrollIndexChange
values.description: Callback to invoke when scroll position and item's range in view changes.

callbacks.label: Callbacks

label: VirtualScroller

values.name: root
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the root's DOM element.

values.name: content
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the content's DOM element.

values.name: loader
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the loader's DOM element.

values.name: loadingIcon
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the loading icon's DOM element.

values.name: spacer
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the spacer's DOM element.

types.label: Props types
types.description: Types used by properties of the VirtualScroller component.

state.description: Defines current inline state in VirtualScroller component.

values.name: first
values.description: First index of the new data range to be loaded as a number.

values.name: last
values.description: Last index of the new data range to be loaded as a number.

values.name: page
values.description: Index of the first item as a number.

values.name: numItemsInViewport
values.description: Visible item count in the viewport as a number.

values.name: numToleratedItems
values.description: Additional elements to add to the DOM outside of the view as a number.

values.name: loading
values.description: Current loading state as a boolean.

values.name: loaderArr
values.description: Loadable items array.

values.name: rows
values.description: Number of rows to be rendered.

values.name: cols
values.description: Number of columns to be rendered.

state.label: VirtualScrollerState
